headline: How buy now, pay later loans could impact your credit score
summary: FICO announced that buy now, pay later loans will start being included in credit scores. Yahoo Finance Personal Finance Banking Editor Casey Bond explains how credit scores are calculated and the role buy now pay later loans will play. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Mind Your Money here.

headline: A new type of credit score bursts onto the mortgage scene
summary: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac can now use a new credit-score metric, VantageScore 4.0.

headline: 'Everybody Is Chasing The Next AI Hype,' Says Investor. But They're Asking: What Are The Boring Stocks With 'Tech-Like Returns?'
summary: An investor recently posed a simple but striking question in Reddit’s r/stocks forum: What are the “‘boring’ stocks with tech-like returns?” “Everybody is chasing the next AI hype,” they said, mentioning companies like Palantir (NASDAQ:PLTR), Rocket Lab (NASDAQ:RKLB) and even semiconductors. When someone mentions semiconductors, they typically refer to companies that design or manufacture these chips, like Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA), Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ:AMD), or Intel (NASDAQ:INTC).
